amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for weatherization programs by $24 million; increase funding for the Payments In Lieu of Taxes program by $12 million; and increase funding for energy conservation programs by $12 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for weatherization programs by $24 million; to increase the account for Payments In Lieu of Taxes by $12 million; and to increase the account for energy conservation programs by $24 million. Increases would be offset by reductions in fossil energy research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 262 (Roll no. 178).
